title: time.Parse incorrectly sets Weekday to Sunday
body:
by **an2048**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
fmt.Print(time.Parse("2006-01-02 15:04:05", "2010-08-13 01:23:45"))

What is the expected output?
Fri Aug 13 01:23:45 +0000 2010 <nil>

What do you see instead?
Sun Aug 13 01:23:45 +0000 2010 <nil>

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
Linux 386, Linux amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
07d3a97302be release.2010-08-11/release
